page.title: 03PLAYGROUND GAMES CTD.
page.content: {PIGGY-BACK FIGHT}: This game does not have any rules.You carry someone on your back.Then you knock other similar pairs over.The last pair standing are the winners.{ { {FIVES}: You can play with as many people as you like.You need a football and some goals.The goalkeeper starts off with seven points and everybody else starts on five.The players have to try and head or volley the ball into the goal.A volley is when you kick the ball without it bouncing first.If they succeed in scoring,the goalkeeper losses one point.However,if the players score without it being a volley or a header the person that kicked it is in goal.The same applies if the ball goes wide.When someone gets nought they are out.
